ModMetaData.name: AnimalHusbandry
ModMetaData.author: MightyGooga
ModMetaData.description:
V1.0 This is a mod that adds things to make farming animals more viable.For now it adds two types of ration called Pellets, stronger than Kibble.
Special Thanks to: - Flonz (Idea) - Sidfu (Support) - NotFood (Support, Coding, BugSolving) - Kubouch (Universal Fermenter) - Cupropanda (Universal Fermenter) - Skyarkhangel (Coding, Support, a huge thanks)
